Subject: So This is Your First Penguicon?
Description: Our chair, Nuri, will talk about how he first joined Penguicon, and give you a tour of what's awesome (everything!) here. If you're new to Penguicon and you want to get to know the event, this is the panel for you!  Speakers include:Nuri Gocay

Subject: Opening Ceremonies
Description: Join our con chair, Nuri Gocay, the Con Committee, and our Guests of Honor as we open this bad boy up for the weekend. You never know what surprises might be in store!  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Scott Kennedy, Lucy Kennedy, Nuri Gocay, Cylithria Dubois, Amanda Long-Adams, Amanda Robinson, Christine Bender, Aral Balkan, Annalee Newitz, Albert Manero, ,Charlie Jane Anders, Ivan Owen, Aaron Brown

Subject: Guest of Honor Social Hour
Description: Get to know our Guests of Honor as we all get together for some cocktails. Meet us in the bar!  Speakers include:Aral Balkan, Annalee Newitz, Albert Manero, ,Charlie Jane Anders, Ivan Owen, Aaron Brown

Subject: Creating Safe Spaces
Description: How can we create safe spaces for people of all varieties at the convention, and in our lives outside of fandom? Join a discussion with our staff (including the con chair) and those who have ideas on how we can do better on inclusivity and promoting consent.  Speakers include:Nuri Gocay, April Nance, Scott Kennedy, Mark Oshiro, Mari Brighe

Subject: Penguicon Board Meeting
Description: You've done the convention, you've met the staff, and you've even socialized with the ConCom. But what about those *other* Penguicon people? Those shadowy figures that create the multi-year rules, have their fingers on the money, and cause a ConChair to mysteriously appear every year in a puff of penguin-scented smoke? Ever wonder what the Penguicon Board of Directors does in their secret sanctum, and where they are taking Penguicon? Come to the Board of Directors meeting and see!  Speakers include:Steve Gutterman, Randy Bradakis, Matt Arnold, Jer Lance, Gini Judd, Amanda Long-Adams, James Hice

Subject: 2014's Con Chair Roast
Description: Our fearless leader has finally found something to fear - a roasting by his friends and underlings! It's probably all in good fun, but don't expect everyone to be sober.  Speakers include:Nuri Gocay, Greg Williams, James Gamble, Britain Woodman, Rathbone the Pirate

Subject: Geek Prom
Description: It's a Timey Wimey prom! Come dressed in your finest formalwear (we've heard bow ties are cool!) or choose a costume from anywhere in space and time and join the Costume Contest! Join us for music, dancing, and fun at Penguicon's Geek Prom! Special performance by DJ Stu!  Speakers include:

Subject: Costume Contest
Description: This year we are making the costume contest a little more informal. This means no Muster, Paperwork, or Registration. You simply show up at the Geek Prom at the right time (9:45!) and say you want to enter. From there it is in the hands of our MC and N.U.E.T.! Come down for some fun and awesome costumes, and maybe enter for a chance to win some cool prizes. Best of Show will receive a free badge to Penguicon 2016!  Speakers include:Alex Drummer, Justin Coluzzi, Kevin McLeod, Albert Manero, Ruth Suehle, Alex Page

Subject: Penguicon 2016 Planning Meeting
Description: Making a successful Penguicon requires at least a year of organizing, planning, and partying. Do not skip the partying! Join us for the first planning meeting with the 2016 ConChair, Scott Kennedy, and his selected Con Committee. If you you want to contribute to Penguicon next year, or you just want to see how we make it happen, join us!  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Scott Kennedy, Lucy Kennedy, Nuri Gocay, Cylithria Dubois, Amanda Long-Adams, Amanda Robinson, Christine Bender

Subject: Closing Ceremonies
Description: As we officially shut down another amazing, exciting year for Penguicon, come hear about how it went, and what we've got our eye on for next year.  Speakers include:Janet Gocay, Scott Kennedy, Lucy Kennedy, Nuri Gocay, Cylithria Dubois, Amanda Long-Adams, Amanda Robinson, Christine Bender, Aral Balkan, Annalee Newitz, Albert Manero, Charlie Jane Anders, Ivan Owen, Aaron Brown
